item.title: Blog Post
item.description: Reticulate Hi y’all! This is blog post. A post in a blog for SDS348: Computational Biology and Bioinformatics. Today, we’ll be talking about RETICULATE Reticulate is a nifty R package that allows R and Python to communicate R library(reticulate) number <- (67+88)*4 Python number = 2*5/14 print(r.number*number) ## 442.8571428571429 Here, I gave R some arithmatic to complete and saved it as number. I also gave python some arithmatic and saved it.
